name: Tricky Treat (Night0, xChratis, chowy, JC)
description:
Once a year, on Halloween night, the harrowing monsters might bring you a fright! Their tummies grumble for a tasty treat, and hangry they'll be when they don't get to eat. Souls and fear are their primary diet, but the candy this night is what makes them riot. No one else will offer their sugary treats. It's up to you to save your town's streets!

Tricky Treat is a spooky Trick or Treating simulation game. Your goal is to stop a mysterious cauldron accompanied by villainous monsters from devouring the town by sacrificing your Halloween candy. Be fast and efficient and you'll be rewarded handsomely. Take too long or offer the wrong candy and you'll be in a world of hurt.

Thanks for playing and Happy Halloween! >:)

-Controls-

WASD - move player
E - interact (Trick or Treat | Feed to Cauldron | Use Trash)
Esc - pause
Spacebar - skip dialogue

-NOTE-
The last two levels of Limited Mode is unbalanced and is difficult to complete. There is an easier build of the game in the downloads.
